name: responseIsError
desc:
Checks whether the supplied response map
has an "error" key. If this is the case, "true" is
returned. If this is not the case, "false" is returned.

name: userExists
desc:
Checks whether the supplied user
exists on the given instance. If they do exist,
"true" is returned. If they don't exist, "false"
is returned.

name: fetchJSON
desc:
Attempts to retrieve a response of
the supplied type in the request headers and
with the other supplied parameters. If this succeeds,
the response is returned as a map. If this fails,
an error is returned as a map.

name: createTextNoteForUser
desc:
Attempts to create a text note on the supplied
instance. The visibility can be set to "public",
"home", "followers" or "direct". The "reactionAcceptance"
parameter allows you to set which reactions can be sent.
For the other parameters, when in doubt, please read
the API documentation here: https://misskey.io/api-doc
If the operation succeeds, a success map is returned.
If the operation fails, an error map is returned.

name: deleteNoteForUser
desc:
Attempts to delete a note.
If the operation succeeds, a success map is returned.
If the operation fails, an error map is returned.

name: getUserNotes
desc:
Attempts to retrieve the notes
a user has created on the supplied instance
as a map. If this fails, an error map is returned.

name: likeNoteForUser
desc:
Attempts to like a note.
If the operation succeeds, a success map is returned.
If the operation fails, an error map is returned.
You can customize which reaction you want to send.

name: unlikeNoteForUser
desc:
Attempts to unlike a note.
If the operation succeeds, a success map is returned.
If the operation fails, an error map is returned.
You can customize which reaction you want to reverse.

name: searchForUser
desc:
Attempts to retrieve a map of
all search results matching the supplied
user's handle. If this fails, an error map
is returned.

name: sharkey
desc:
Exports all functions
in the "users" module.

name: globalTimeline
desc:
Attempts to retrieve a map
of all notes on the supplied
instance and instances federated
with it. If this fails, an error
map is returned.

name: instanceTimeline
desc:
Attempts to retrieve a map
of all notes on the supplied
instance. If this fails, an error
map is returned.

name: mentionedTimeline
desc:
Attempts to retrieve a map
of all notes a user has been mentioned in.
If this fails, an error
map is returned.

name: followUser
desc:
Attempts to follow a user. If the operation
succeeds, a success map is returned. If this
fails, an error map is returned.

name: getUserFollowers
desc:
Attempts to get a list of users who are
following a user. If this fails, an error map is
returned.

name: getUserFollowing
desc:
Attempts to get a list of users a user
is following. If this fails, an error map is
returned.

name: getUserInfo
desc:
Attempts to return the information
about a user profile as a map.
If this fails, an error as a map is
returned.

name: unfollowUser
desc:
Attempts to unfollow a user. If the operation
succeeds, a success map is returned. If this
fails, an error map is returned.

name: getApiTokenFromEnv
desc:
Attempts to retrieve the value stored
in the supplied "envVar" name. If this
fails, an empty string is returned.
